column5: I was wondering if anyone of you guys have any idea about a lake with crappie on a 50 km radius of Kitchener. No ice, of course. But of you know a lake that still has ice...I might be interested. Feel like going for some slabs on Saturday. Cheers! Gino
I've been wondering the same thing! Me and my buddy want to get out Saturday for some but dont know where to go Luc
